vote.title: To honor, recognize, and celebrate Rudolph Deering for his 35 years of public service and dedication to the City of Columbus.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor, recognize, and celebrate Rudolph Deering for his 35 years of public service and dedication to the City of Columbus.
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, this Council honors and recognizes Rudolf “Rudy” Deering for his outstanding service to the City of Columbus by giving his skills, energy, time, and commitment toward the betterment of our community through his dedicated service to the City of Columbus; and
WHEREAS, Rudy has served as a Custodial Worker within the Department of Finance and Management, and has been a dedicated and exemplary employee of the City of Columbus for nearly 35 years; and
WHEREAS, Rudy has demonstrated an unwavering commitment to excellence with his tireless work ethic, positive attitude, enthusiasm, and genuine care for co-workers, constituents, and Elected Officials; and
WHEREAS, Rudy’s contributions have gone beyond the duties of his role - he has touched the lives of countless individuals, has exemplified the highest standards of professionalism, integrity, and kindness, and has made many friends in his division and department and throughout the City; and
WHEREAS, Rudy is retiring from his career in city government on December 6, 2024, and will be missed by all of his co-workers; and   
WHEREAS, Rudy is deserving of recognition for faithful service to the citizens of Columbus; now, therefore 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: that we honor and recognize Rudolf “Rudy” Deering for his lasting contributions to the City of Columbus and the residents of our community.
